description:
Kyousuke decides not to answer Kuroneko`s confession and asks her for a day to think it over. As Kirino and Manami give him their support, he ends up spending a day with her trying to organize how he feels. On their way home from the comiket after-party together with everyone else, Kyousuke finally gives Kuroneko his answer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Can`t Become a Couple with My Underclassman
Je ne suis pas censé sortir avec ma disciple
Ore ga Kouhai to Koibito Doushi ni Naru Wake ga Nai
俺が後輩と恋人同士になるわけがない
